title: Daily Blotter: 09/26/2015
content:
Officers responded to a report of phone harassment on County Road 3240 on Thursday, records show, and officers rendered assistance. 
  
A report of a burn ban violation was received on Thursday on County Road 3015, records show, and officers rendered aid. 
      
Officers responded to a report of suspicious activity on County Road 1660, records show, and officers rendered assistance. 
 
A report of a possible prowler was received on Friday on County Road 4015, records show, and officers rendered aid. 
 
Officers responded to a report of a disturbance in progress on West Mclean Street in Talco on Friday, records show, and officers rendered assistance.
